MS MCQs

    Introduction to Azure DDoS Protection

    »

    1. Which layers of the OSI model do DDoS Protocol attacks target?

      The Physical L1 and Data Link L2 layers

      The Network L3 and Transport L4 layers

      The Session L5 and the Presentation L6 layers


    2. Which Azure DDoS Protection service offers DDoS rapid response support?

      DDoS Protection Standard

      DDoS Protection Basic

      This service isn’t offered with DDoS Protection Basic or DDoS Protection Standard.


    3. What should an administrator do with the data logged during a DDoS attack?

      Discard this data when the attack is over.

      Use this data to analyze the attack.

      Immediately clear your logs during the attack.
